title: Uber users in the United States 2017 , by device
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of visits for 4 number of Devices.
Device Smartphone has the highest Number of visits and Tablet has the lowest Number of visits.
The highest value at Device Smartphone is 14.75x times more than the lowest value at Tablet.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Device, and Number of visits in each Device on the y axis.
The maximum Number of visits 17.7 is found at Device Smartphone and the minimum is found at Tablet where Device is 1.2.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of visits for 4 number of Devices.
Device Smartphone has the highest Number of visits and Tablet has the lowest Number of visits.
The highest value at Device Smartphone is 14.75x times more than the lowest value at Tablet.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Device in the x axis and Number of visits in the y axis.
The Number of visits is highest at Device Smartphone and lowest at Device Tablet.
The second highest Number of visits is appeared to be the Device Mobile-only.
The highest Device Smartphone has 16.5 more Number of visits than the lowest Device Tablet.
The Device Smartphone has the highest Number of visits, followed by Mobile-only, and Desktop. Down to the Device Tablet which is the lowest.
The Device Smartphone tends to be 1.67 percent higher than average.
